item.title: Why Colo Bandwidth Pricing Is Lowest
item.description:
Intrigued by the idea of significantly cheaper bandwidth? Take a look at the pricing for colocation bandwidth and see for yourself. It’s tempting, right? The cost per Mbps at a colocation center is often much lower than standard bandwidth costs for your servers, even with a discounted rate from a telecom broker. While this might seem unfair, it’s simply a matter of economics. Colocation facilities can offer these reduced costs for a couple of reasons...
